lead_paragraph: Rousing, smart, and sweet, Amira&Sam is a confident feature debut from writer-director Sean Mullin, and follows Sam (Martin Starr, "Freaks&Geeks", "Silicon Valley"), an army veteran adapting back to civilian life after a lengthy tour overseas. U
snippet: Rousing, smart, and sweet, Amira&Sam is a confident feature debut from writer-director Sean Mullin, and follows Sam (Martin Starr, "Freaks&Geeks", "Silicon Valley"), an army veteran adapting back to civilian life after a lengthy tour overseas. U
